title: Exponential Growth Formula
text: We have the exponential growth formula $$P(t)=P0 \left(1+r\right)^t$$.

title: Value Given
text: We are given that: Initial population (P0): 23,900 foxes (in 2012), Annual growth rate (r): 9% $$=$$ $$0.09$$, Time (t): $$2020$$ - $$2012$$ $$=$$ $$8$$ years

title: Substitute the Value
text: Plug in the values, we get $$P(8)=23900\left(1+0.09\right)^8$$
